creator: sjohri@jaguarlandrover.com
text:
httpd: Syntax error on line 57 of /usr/sap/JQP/Apache2.22/httpd-22-x64/conf/httpd.conf: Cannot load /usr/sap/JQP/Apache2.22/httpd-22-x64/modules/mod_sapcsc22.o into server: Not enough space

NOT ENOUGH SPACE error on AIX 6.1 as soon as i enable the mod_sapcsc22.o module.

Please help its very urgent and stopping production.

Thanks in Advance.

creator: trawick@apache.org
text:
There's nothing here to indicate that the error is due to an Apache httpd bug.

Feel free to use the user support mailing list (http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html#http-users).  However, the solution is most likely to come from the provider of the third-party module mod_sapcsc22.

creator: sjohri@jaguarlandrover.com
text:
This is not related to third-party module mod_sapcsc22 may be this could be issue with apache 2.2 and AIX OS side but no resolution yet on the internet...many have faced this issue with the apache and AIX 6.1 so request you to help me in resolving it.

 Syntax error on line 423 of /home/apache22-aix64/installApache/conf/httpd.conf: Syntax error on line 9 of / /home/apache22-aix64/installApache/conf/agent.conf: Cannot load /home/agent/apache/lib/auth-module.so into server: Not enough space

this is a error which is same as above but no resolution yet.

creator: trawick@apache.org
text:
Hello,

We get to decide the appropriate venue for assisting you.

This looks like an issue for the user support mailing list, not the bug database.  It is not a perfect assessment, but its the best I can do with the available information.

There's no promise of any help either way so you're not missing out on anything by using the user support mailing list, and at the very least you would be following the advice of the volunteers you want to help you, which itself might be considered as a positive step on your part.  YMMV.

(In reply to saurabh from comment #2)
> This is not related to third-party module mod_sapcsc22 may be this could be
> issue with apache 2.2 and AIX OS side but no resolution yet on the
> internet...many have faced this issue with the apache and AIX 6.1 so request
> you to help me in resolving it.
> 
>  Syntax error on line 423 of
> /home/apache22-aix64/installApache/conf/httpd.conf: Syntax error on line 9
> of / /home/apache22-aix64/installApache/conf/agent.conf: Cannot load
> /home/agent/apache/lib/auth-module.so into server: Not enough space
> 
> this is a error which is same as above but no resolution yet.

Just so happens to be another module not developed by the ASF or handled by this bugzilla. 

Bugzilla isn't for support or help, it's for reporting bugs.

I suggest you take the issue up with IBM if you don't think you've got a bad module.
creator: covener@gmail.com
